data.text:
Tremendous service by the hotel staff at every encounter.
Property kept in great shape at all times.
Very responsive to any and all requests.
Gave great advice on places to see, things to do, places to eat, as well as directions and insights.
data.title: Great Service

data.text: We got there before check in and the helpful front desk staff were able to get our room ready very quickly, all while they were giving us a detailed overview of the main attractions close to the hotel.  We stayed 3 in the room so it was  tight but very manageable.  The room was modern and with a large bathroom.   The front desk staffed were friendly and helped us with restaurant recommendations and how to find a nice food market 5 minutes away.  The location was extremely close to a Metro line which was great and  the area was quiet at night but not desolate.  Finally, the buffet breakfast at the hotel had many options and was tasty and well arranged.
data.title: Gallery Great in  Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear mia2nyc,

Thank you indeed for taking the time to relay your detailed and honest feedback of your recent stay with us. 

It is very kind of you mentioning the possibility of doing an early check in and how we helped you to understand where the main and closest attractions and the best restaurants of the area are.

The proximity to the Metro line and the quiet yet lively neighborhood is part of our privileged location, and it really helps to feel like you're truly immersed in the heart of the city.

And finally, we appreciate your feedback about the breakfast and its variety. We hope to welcome you back again soon!
Warm regards,

Aarón Hernández

Front desk assistant manager
owner_response.author: Aaron Hernández

data.text: Absolutely fantastic location and a beautiful, clean hotel. Probably the most comfortable hotel bed I’ve ever slept in. You can hear the rumbling of the Metro on lower floors, but it’s not disruptive, even for a light sleeper like me. Super friendly staff and great European breakfast top off an outstanding hotel that will be my go-to hotel for future visits to Barcelona!
data.title: Beautiful boutique hotel in great location!

owner_response.title: Owner response

Thank you for your wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear that you found our hotel's location fantastic and appreciated its cleanliness.

Your kind comment about our colleagues is highly appreciated. Rest assured that your feedback has been taken onboard fully and already been discussed with the team. This will definitely help us strive to provide the highest level of service in all areas of the hotel.

We look forward to welcoming you back again at the hotel on your next visit to Barcelona.

Regards,

Aarón Hernández
Front desk assistant manager

data.text: I had the pleasure of visiting Barcelona with my mother as she has always wanted to see La Sagrada Familia. I chose The Gallery Hotel for its location and great reviews which are well deserved. We were warmly greeted on arrival by the wonderful Nuria and she continued to look after us beautifully during our stay - she is a fantastic asset to the Hotel. We really enjoyed our breakfast each day and the staff in the restaurant were also very good. The room was extremely comfortable and clean and the house keeping team were also very good. I can only imagine that the hotel is a lovely place to work as everyone was so friendly!
data.title: Perfect stay in Barcelona
